alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 25 at 1:29AM CDT until June 25 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 409 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MINNESOTA LINCOLN LYON MURRAY PIPESTONE IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA BROOKINGS LAKE MOODY IN SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA CHARLES MIX DOUGLAS GREGORY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA HANSON HUTCHINSON MCCOOK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALEXANDRIA, ARMOUR, BRIDGEWATER, BROOKINGS, BURKE, CANISTOTA, CLAYTON, CORSICA, DELMONT, EMERY, FLANDREAU, FREEMAN, FULDA, GREGORY, HENDRICKS, IVANHOE, LAKE ANDES, LAKE BENTON, MADISON, MARSHALL, MARTY, MENNO, MONTROSE, ORLAND, PARKSTON, PIPESTONE, PLATTE, SALEM, SLAYTON, TRIPP, TYLER, AND WAGNER. THIS ALSO INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE YANKTON SIOUX TRIBAL NATION AND THE FLANDREAU SANTEE SIOUX TRIBAL NATION.
